services.hero.title: Engineering services built for reliability and scale.
services.hero.subtitle: From cloud‑native automation to cryptographically secure licensing and document pipelines, BlueBits helps teams ship robust production systems.
services.offer.title: What we offer
services.offer.subtitle: Three commercial service tracks designed around recurring real‑world needs.
services.track.devops.title: DevOps, CI & Infrastructure
services.track.devops.text: Design and implementation of scalable CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure‑as‑code baselines, environment orchestration, and observability for modern teams.
services.track.license.title: License Servers (DSA Cryptography)
services.track.license.text: Architecture and implementation of license servers that use asymmetric DSA signatures to validate application licenses both online and offline.
services.track.ai.title: AI‑Assisted Document Translation
services.track.ai.text: End‑to‑end pipelines for translating technical and business documents using AI assistance, with deterministic review and approval stages.
services.track.ai.item2: AI draft translation with custom prompts

tools.hero.title: Tools & libraries built for developers.
tools.hero.subtitle: A small, focused set of free utilities that we use in our own work—available for you to fork, extend, and embed into your workflows.
tools.projects.title: Projects
tools.projects.subtitle: Each project ships with documentation, examples and permissive open‑source licensing.
tools.projects.note: The links below point to placeholder GitHub repositories and release downloads for this prototype.
tools.libbios.title: libBIOS
tools.libbios.text: Cross‑platform C++ library providing structured access to low‑level BIOS calls and interfaces for diagnostics and tooling.
tools.libentropy.title: libEntropy
tools.libentropy.text: Cross‑platform C++ helper for estimating entropy, helping detect compressed, encrypted, or random data blocks in larger streams.
tools.codegen.title: Code Generator
tools.codegen.text: Python package, CLI and library that uses AI assistance to generate DTOs, tests and boilerplate from JSON‑based interface descriptions.
tools.nugetflow.title: NugetFlow
tools.nugetflow.text: DevOps helper for managing NuGet package feeds, publishing and promotion across environments, with automation‑friendly conventions.
tools.versionflow.title: VersionFlow
tools.versionflow.text: Lightweight tool for versioning, changelog generation and release metadata, integrated with common CI providers and Git workflows.

blog.hero.title: Engineering notes, experiments & deep dives.
blog.hero.subtitle: Short, practical essays on systems engineering, software development, digital privacy, and building reliable software products.
blog.articles.title: Latest articles
blog.articles.subtitle: Two sample posts to illustrate layout and styling.
blog.post1.title: Using the Digital Signature Algorithm (DSA) for License Verification
blog.post1.excerpt: How asymmetric signatures can keep your licensing logic on the client side while still letting you retain full control over which builds are allowed to run. We walk through the architecture of a DSA‑backed license server and validation library.
blog.post2.title: Migrating to Privacy‑Respecting, Zero‑Knowledge Services
blog.post2.excerpt: A practical, low‑drama way to move from mainstream ecosystems like Google Drive, Dropbox and Evernote to services that apply zero‑knowledge encryption and minimize data exhaust.
